c.mysql: SELECT domainId id, parentId, domainName, domainValue, sort, "others", fullpath FROM a_domain order by fullpath limit 5;
c.sqlit: SELECT domainId id, parentId, domainName, domainValue, sort, "others", fullpath, stamp, upstamp FROM a_domain order by fullpath;

c.mysql: SELECT funcId, parentId, funcName, funcUrl url, isUsed sort, fullpath FROM a_sys_functions f order by f.fullpath
c.sqlit: SELECT funcId, parentId, funcName, url, sibling sort, fullpath FROM a_functions f order by f.fullpath

c.mysql: select projectId, projectName, parentId, fullpath, sort from p_projects p where p.orgId = '%s'
select roleId as value,roleName as text from a_roles
c.sqlit: select roleId as value,roleName as text from a_roles

c.mysql: select orgId as value, orgName as text from a_reg_org
select departId value, orgId, departName text, departState from a_org_depart where orgId = '%s'
select orgId value, orgName text from a_orgs
c.sqlit: select orgId value, orgName text from a_orgs

c.mysql: select r.roleId is not null checked, funcName text, f.funcId, parentId,f.funcId sort, fullpath from a_sys_functions f left outer join a_role_funcs r on r.funcId = f.funcId and r.roleId = '%s' order by fullpath
select wfId value, wfName text from oz_workflow

select false checked, n.nodeId, nodeName, n.nodeId value, nodeName text, '' roleId, concat(n.wfId, '/', n.nodeId) fullpath, 0 sort, wfId parent from oz_wfnodes n where n.wfId = '%1$s' union select r.roleId is not null checked, n.nodeId, nodeName, c.cmd value, c.txt text, r.roleId, concat(n.wfId, '/', n.nodeId, '/', ifnull(c.cmd, '')) fullpath, c.sort, n.nodeId parent from oz_wfnodes n join oz_wfcmds c on n.nodeId = c.nodeId and n.wfId = '%1$s' left outer join oz_wfrights r on c.cmd = r.cmd and r.roleId = '%2$s' order by fullpath, sort
